text: James H. Langdon Jr. (born January 17, 1938) was a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/41592/james-langdon- jr#.VWvajGTBzGchttp://ncchamber.capwiz.com/ncchamber/bio/id/146730 He represented the 28th district. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:21st-century American politicians Category:1938 births Category:People from Benson, North Carolina
title: James Langdon Jr.
